entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -16.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 8:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -16.0°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -22.9°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
